mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.into_cust_ref_id , t1.code , t1.ret_desc , t1.trans_id , t1.trade_no , t1.fee , t1.id_no , t1.id_name , t1.member_count , t1.order_count , t1.debt_amount , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.create_by , t1.modify_by from ext_wl_xy_overdue t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_wl_xy_overdue t1 set t1.into_cust_ref_id =#{dto.intoCustRefId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.code =#{dto.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.ret_desc =#{dto.retDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.trans_id =#{dto.transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.trade_no =#{dto.tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.fee =#{dto.fee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.id_no =#{dto.idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.id_name =#{dto.idName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.member_count =#{dto.memberCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.order_count =#{dto.orderCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.debt_amount =#{dto.debtAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.create_time =#{dto.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.modify_time =#{dto.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.create_by =#{dto.createBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.modify_by =#{dto.modifyBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_wl_xy_overdue t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_wl_xy_overdue t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
